quote: What criterion ought one to adopt to judge one's fellows? After all, there was not a single person he knew who might not, in certain circumstances, prove capable of a shameful action.
quote_letters: WHAT CRITERION OUGHT ONE TO ADOPT TO JUDGE ONES FELLOWS AFTER ALL THERE WAS NOT A SINGLE PERSON HE KNEW WHO MIGHT NOT IN CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES PROVE CAPABLE OF A SHAMEFUL ACTION
